title: Missing Champions, skins, etc
body:
Good day,

To whomever may be able to help.
I have logged back in after a 2 year hiatus from the birth of my children only to notice that I am missing several champions, and skins as well.
My purchase history is sure to include these, and judging from my game history in ranked during the season start of 2015, I am sure you'll be able to see that I did indeed own specific champions.

Thanks,

Skolr

replies.body:
Appreciate the response, turns out I logged on an account I had initially lost the username for back in highschool! Found the correct one, and everything is in order.

Thanks!

Oooooo it's never good to log in and notice that some items are missing! If you reach out to us in an [Account Recovery Form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), our specialists there will be able to help repair anything that may have happened.

Hang tight and they'll be with you as soon as they can!
